item.description:
It's been too long since I've eaten here.  Good Peruvian food and reasonably priced! Very festive atmosphere, so let's make this our "Holiday" dinner.  2011 Hardford Advocate "Best of Hartford" readers poll winner.

"Come into Cora Cora Restaurant to experience the traditional tastes of Peru. With expertly crafted dishes by our professional chefs, youll get a taste of the herbs, spices and flavors of Peruvian dishes that you wont find in any other style of cooking.  If youre in the mood to experience something new and exciting, why not give your taste buds a real adventure!"

The website is  http://coraperu.com/pages/welcome.asp

If the meetup is full, put your name on the "wait" list and I will increase the reservation (up to a max of sixteen).  If need be, you must change your reservation by 4:00pm the day BEFORE so I have an accurate count to confirm the reservation.

I will collect $1.00 from each guest for meetup "dues".

Hope to see you there.  Happy Holidays! - Betsy

* Please note that I do not usually cancel due to weather unless there is a traffic advisory.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: CORA CORA 12/15/11 6:45pm
